Episode 150 "Doug's Best Day" - Doug is allowed to try soda on the first anniversary of his twin brother's death

Episode 145 "Heartbreak Doug" - Some mean kids convince Doug that a statue is in love with him.

Episode 143 "Brave Doug" - Doug considers it a triumph that he wasn't too afraid to go to the library. He documents it in his journal.
